title: We should be able to play with other regions in custom game modes
body: I just think it'd make sense I'm not saying in any other game mode. Buts what the harm in allowing cross region play in custom matches and if you don't want some one from NA or EU you can just kick them

replies.body: Hint: The reason this doesn't work is because of how servers work.
This isn't a bad idea but the lag will be a big issue ...
